title: China Open: Novak Djokovic, Rafael Nadal, Pennetta in action - Tennis
text:
by SI.com Staff Email Posted: Mon Oct. 5, 2015 The Watch List spotlights the must-know storylines for the upcoming week in tennis. This week, the ATP Tour moves to Beijing and Tokyo for the China Open and the Rakuten Japan Open, while the WTA's Asian swing continues with its Premier Mandatory-level event â€‹in Beijing as both tours near the year-end finals.
